reviews.text: Excellent restaurant with 5 star service. We had the salmon and it was cooked perfectly. Janette our waitress was super friendly and we enjoyed her...
Food selection is small, but the preparation was great.  Also, the bartender is a master in customer service.
The Bistro is called flight and it's fitting that I'm the second person to review because I had to take my second choice off the menu they were out of the...
